hero.title: About GrowWise
hero.subtitle: Since 2019, GrowWise has been transforming education in Dublin, CA, through personalized K-12 instruction and innovative STEAM programs. We empower every student with the skills, knowledge, and confidence they need to succeed.

coreValues.title: Our Mission
coreValues.description: To empower every student with personalized education that builds strong academic foundations while fostering creativity, critical thinking, and a lifelong love of learning.

coreValues.title: Our Vision
coreValues.description: To be the leading educational center in the Tri-Valley area, transforming students into confident, capable learners ready for future academic and career success.

coreValues.title: Our Values
coreValues.description: Excellence in education, personalized attention, innovative teaching methods, strong community partnerships, and unwavering commitment to student success.

achievements.title: 300+ Students Served
achievements.description: Since 2019, we've helped over 300 students achieve their academic goals

achievements.title: 98% Satisfaction Rate
achievements.description: Consistently high parent and student satisfaction scores

achievements.title: 95% Improvement Rate
achievements.description: 95% of students show measurable improvement within first semester

achievements.title: 5+ Years of Excellence
achievements.description: Recognized as a leading educational center in Dublin and Tri-Valley area

educationalApproach.title: Personalized Learning
educationalApproach.description: Every student receives instruction tailored to their unique learning style, pace, and academic goals through individualized assessment and customized lesson plans.

educationalApproach.title: Small Class Sizes
educationalApproach.description: With maximum 6 students per K-12 class and 4 per STEAM class, every student receives the attention and support they need to succeed.

educationalApproach.title: Innovative Methods
educationalApproach.description: We combine proven traditional teaching methods with cutting-edge educational technology and hands-on learning experiences.

educationalApproach.title: Goal-Oriented Approach
educationalApproach.description: We set clear, measurable goals for each student and track progress regularly to ensure continuous improvement and success.

communityImpact.title: Local School Partnerships
communityImpact.description: Collaborating with Dublin Unified School District and surrounding schools to support student success

communityImpact.title: Parent Workshops
communityImpact.description: Regular workshops helping parents support their children's learning journey at home

communityImpact.title: STEM Outreach
communityImpact.description: Community events and coding workshops to inspire the next generation of innovators

testimonials.name: Jennifer Martinez
testimonials.content: GrowWise has been transformational for Sofia. She went from struggling with math to being excited about algebra. The personalized approach really works!

testimonials.name: Alex Chen
testimonials.content: The Python programming course at GrowWise opened up a whole new world for me. I'm now pursuing computer science in college thanks to the foundation I built here.

testimonials.name: Robert Johnson
testimonials.content: The reading enrichment program helped Emma develop a genuine love for books. Her confidence and comprehension have improved dramatically.

teamMembers.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
teamMembers.bio: With over 15 years in education, Dr. Chen founded GrowWise to provide personalized learning experiences that help every student reach their full potential.

teamMembers.name: Michael Rodriguez
teamMembers.bio: A passionate mathematics educator who believes every student can excel in math with the right approach and support.

teamMembers.name: Lisa Thompson
teamMembers.bio: An award-winning educator specializing in reading comprehension, creative writing, and helping students find their unique voice.

teamMembers.name: David Kim
teamMembers.bio: A tech industry veteran turned educator, passionate about introducing young minds to coding, robotics, and entrepreneurship.
